summary: An FBI email forwarding a message from the Victims' Rights line regarding a male victim of Jeffrey Epstein who was offered counseling during a recent meeting and is seeking further information.

persons.name: Tiddle, L.
persons.context: Author of the original email retrieved from the Victims' Rights line regarding an Epstein victim seeking information.

events.title: Epstein victim contacts FBI Victims' Rights line
events.description: A male victim of Jeffrey Epstein calls the FBI's Victims' Rights line, stating he was offered counseling during a recent meeting and seeks further information.

keyFacts: A male victim of Jeffrey Epstein contacted the FBI's Victims' Rights line in January 2021.
The victim reported being offered counseling during a recent meeting.
The victim was seeking further information from the FBI.
The communication was forwarded within the FBI, indicating ongoing victim outreach or follow-up years after Epstein's death.
